feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.65.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: refactor trial (#8223) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: one big change (#8198) @abuaboud
  • feat: revamp agents to v2 (#8201) @abuaboud
  • chore: revamp piece selector (#8191) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • refactor: new chat trigger (#8196) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • fix(notion): add error message for missing notion field type (#8324) @kishanprmr
  • feat: wufoo piece (#8290) @krushnarout
  • fix(dimo): fix vehicle token generation function and telemetry API props (#8321) @yusuf-cirak
  • feat(microsoft-power-bi): create dataset and push rows to table actions (#8086) @calladodan
  • feat(metabase): embedding question action (#8307) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat: scrapeless piece (#8178) @sunorains
  • feat: airtop piece (#8214) @aryel780
  • feat: notion piece bounty (#8217) @ezhil56x
  • feat(flow-helper): fail flow action (#7851) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub
  • feat: Fillout forms piece (#8240) @Sanket6652
  • fix(elevenlabs): update library and support API regions (#8238) @marapper
  • feat(pieces): pieces-dimo integration (#8064) @yusuf-cirak
  • fix(s3): update trigger strategy to time based for duplicate file issue (#8255) @kishanprmr
  • feat(xero): add attachments/settings scope (#8256) @kishanprmr
  • feat(metabase): improve get graph (#8239) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat: Cognito Forms Piece (#7863) @krushnarout
  • feat(dust): bump SDK version to fix API error (#8202) @AdamSelene
  • feat(wedof): adding tag piece (#8052) @obenazouz-wedof

üõ†Ô∏è Piece Framework

  • feat: added datetime to array (#8258) @Akira013

üêû Bug Fixes

  • patch logical error for postgres password wrong (#8298) @teochenglim
  • fix: request trial button + text color on role dialog (#8316) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: make draft flow version show correct piece action/trigger props for latest patched version (#8268) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: return json instead of raw for older universal ai pieces (#8305) @amrdb
  • fix: step is not defined in the issue (#8297) @abuaboud
  • fix: inline items in sandbox code only (#8296) @abuaboud
  • feat(executors): add duration tracking for action execution steps (#8293) @abuaboud
  • fix: show loading to step that actually running (#8292) @abuaboud
  • fix: make the inital title and icon for the app load from env variables (#8274) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: http proxy wasn't sending body or headers correctly (#8267) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(ai-providers): gemini 2.5 pro pricing model (#8233) @amrdb
  • fix: user can't dismiss changelog announcement to themselves (#8263) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: improve MCP parameter extraction prompt (#8253) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: stripe webhook for payg and enterprise (#8252) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: optmize code builds (#8245) @abuaboud
  • fix: saving button for branding in platform settings was always disabled (#8244) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: agent error handling (#8224) @amrdb
  • fix: openai streaming always include usage (#8220) @amrdb
  • fix: ai credits redis increment floats (#8210) @amrdb
  • fix(hot): skip platformPlan info fetch in project dashboard (#8208) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: agent execution message and output (#8207) @amrdb
  • fix(hot): make billing cycle dates nullable (#8204) @Louai-Zokerburg

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: implement integration tests for AI providers (#8271) @amrdb
  • feat(executors): add duration tracking for action execution steps (#8293) @abuaboud
  • chore: add top 110 used pieces translations (#8270) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: upgrade agent helper to use gpt-4o instead of gpt-4o-mini (#8262) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add inputs and code mirror json viewer to agent tool block (#8246) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: resolve dynamic properties in MCP tools (#8227) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: resolve dynamic properties in MCP tools (#8195) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: list users endpoint by external id (#8200) @abuaboud
  • feat: implement agent selector (#8199) @abuaboud
  • feat(docker): optimize build cache by reordering COPY and npm ci (#8193) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add calladodan as a contributor for plugin (#8314) @allcontributors
  • docs: add sunorains as a contributor for plugin (#8313) @allcontributors
  • docs: add ezhil56x as a contributor for plugin (#8306) @allcontributors
  • docs: add yusuf-cirak as a contributor for plugin (#8266) @allcontributors
  • docs: add marapper as a contributor for plugin (#8248) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: add more flags (#8308) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps): bump koa and @nx/react (#8309) @dependabot
  • refactor: clean up run status (#8265) @abuaboud
  • refactor: ai credits (#8230) @abuaboud
  • refactor: ai credits overage (#8228) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: translations (#8184) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @Akira013, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Kevinyu-alan, @Louai-Zokerburg, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @aryel780, @calladodan, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @ezhil56x, @hazemadelkhalel, @joshuaheslin, @kishanprmr, @krushnarout, @marapper, @obenazouz-wedof, @onyedikachi-david, @sunorains, @teochenglim and @yusuf-cirak

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.0
entry.content:
Note For Embedding SDK:

embedding.dashboard.hideSidebar used to hide the navbar above the flows table in the dashboard now it relies on embedding.dashboard.hideFlowsPageNavbar, please upgrade your SDK version to 0.6.0.

‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: ai credits usage table (#8360) @amrdb
  • feat: introduce piece selector tabs (#8312) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • chore: add Helm Chart (#8327) @amrdb

üß© Pieces

  • fix(demo): description (#8385) @jamesliupenn
  • feat: mistral-ai piece (#8370) @sparkybug
  • feat: formstack piece (#8295) @Sanket6652
  • feat(messagebird): list messages action (#8333) @prasanna2000-max
  • feat(amazon-s3): move file action (#8335) @Daniel-Klippa
  • feat: checkout piece (#8331) @sparkybug
  • feat(jira-cloud): add component field type (#8206) @cjwooo
  • feat: pandadoc piece (#7948) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat(slack): add action to list all users of a workspace (#8325) @AdamSelene

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: testing instant triggers for pieces other than webhooks were not working (#8376) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: sync pieces command (#8329) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: move e2e tests from checkly to github action (#8282) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: improve email journey (#8304) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: group mcp tools by piece name (#8362) @hazemadelkhalel
  • chore: add better categorization under AI and Agents tab in the piece selector (#8364) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: added new flag for hiding flows table navbar in the sdk (#8289) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • refactor: merge license key with billing (#8359) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • feat: handle project locking (#8301) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • chore: add explore tab content (#8317) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: decouple agent piece version from mcp tool naming (#8273) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: polish tables (#8342) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add sparkybug as a contributor for plugin (#8334) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: added saving indicator for agent builder (#8379) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • refactor(ui): license key section (#8369) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: resolve OS-specific path bug in publish-piece (#8344) @prethith

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @Daniel-Klippa, @Louai-Zokerburg, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @cjwooo, @hazemadelkhalel, @jamesliupenn, @kishanprmr, @onyedikachi-david, @prasanna2000-max, @prethith and @sparkybug

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: testing piece instant triggers were always asking users to add new data instead of getting real data that already exists (#8400) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: testing MCP triggers wasn't showing the required dialog (#8397) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer and @abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.2
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(gemini): add 2.5 flash and 2.5 pro models (#8403) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: publishing piece to npm through tools scripts (#8407) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add configurable pkce method support for oauth2 (#8144) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: lock mcps, agents and tables on limits exceeded (#8384) @Louai-Zokerburg

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Louai-Zokerburg, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @onyedikachi-david

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.3
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add platform operator role (#7911) @kamal

üß© Pieces

  • feat(wedof): update piece (#8318) @obenazouz-wedof
  • feat: ninox piece (#8356) @Sanket6652
  • feat: short-io piece (#8393) @aryel780
  • fix(piece.dimo): telemetry actions, typos (#8425) @yusuf-cirak
  • feat(dimo): add vehicle events actions (#8423) @yusuf-cirak
  • feat: clicksend piece (#8279) @sparkybug
  • fix(utility-ai): add missing auth header (#8419) @amrdb
  • feat: fireberry piece (#8395) @sparkybug
  • feat(HTTP): add binary body handling (#8012) @simonc

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: undefined limits arriving as 0 value from platform route (#8426) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: make discord notification sent if checkly report exists (#8421) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: column external id isn't used in tables actions/triggers in table releases (#8382) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: disable (Test Step) button while inputs like dropdown are still loading (#8414) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: chats were infinitely loading for people not logged in (#8412) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: connect checkly to github action and run e2e tests (#8416) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add trial gifting route (#8418) @Louai-Zokerburg

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Louai-Zokerburg, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @amrdb, @aryel780, @hazemadelkhalel, @kamal, @kishanprmr, @obenazouz-wedof, @onyedikachi-david, @simonc, @sparkybug and @yusuf-cirak
